column1: Uchi////I realize eating sushi from to-go boxes in the car is NOT the ideal way to consume it. Especially from a high-end place like Uchi. But that being said -Â we literally were given our food
column4: and ate it. I don't think it would have tasted much different from inside the building. The only difference was that it as hard to differentiate what each roll was
column5: without a waiter's help. We basically just ordered everything from the review highlights
column6: and played the guessing game as to which was which.
